prompt:
You are provided with a list of characters, evidences and testimonies.
Characters:
Character 0
Name: Maya Fey
Description: My assistant until a year ago. Now she's training to be a spirit medium.
Character 1
Name: Dr. Turner Grey
Description: The director of the Grey Surgical Clinic where the malpractice incident occurred.
Character 2
Name: Pearl Fey
Description: Ran away as soon as she saw me. A girl who is Maya's little cousin.
Character 3
Name: Morgan Fey
Description: Maya's aunt. She has a strange, powerful aura about her.
Character 4
Name: Lotta Hart
Description: Claims to be an investigative photographer. She lives for the next big scoop.
Character 5
Name: Dick Gumshoe
Description: Detective at the local precinct. In charge of the initial investigation.
Character 6
Name: Ini Miney
Description: College student. A huge fan of the occult and is doing research in parapsychology.
Character 7
Name: Mimi Miney
Description: Died in a car accident 1 year ago. Was Ini's older sister, nurse at Dr. Grey's clinic.
Character 8
Name: Mia Fey
Description: Maya's older sister. She was a top notch lawyer and my mentor and friend forever.
Character 9
Name: Franziska von Karma
Description: Became a prosecutor in Germany at age 13. A prodigy who has never known defeat.
Character 10
Name: Ami Fey
Description: Kurain Channeling Technique founder. Legend says her soul is sealed in the Sacred Urn.
Character 11
Name: Director Hotti (purported)
Description: A peculiar patient who claims to be Director Hotti. Seems to be extremely "healthy".
Evidences:
Evidence 0
Name: Attorney's Badge
Description: It's my all-important badge. It shows that I am a defense attorney.
Evidence 1
Name: Guidemap (Fey Manor)
Description: A diagram of Fey Manor. Meditation room to the south. Channeling chamber north of meditation room. Side room to the east, have to go through winding path from meditation room to get to side room.
Evidence 2
Name: Maya's Magatama
Description: Slightly translucent. It's small, but it has a deep, profound aura about it. Slightly translucent. It radiates softly with a mysterious light.
Evidence 3
Name: Newspaper Clipping 1
Description: One year ago on May 2nd, 14 patients died from malpractice at Grey Surgical Clinic.
Evidence 4
Name: Folding Screen
Description: About 8 inches off the ground is a small hole that looks like a bullet hole.
Evidence 5
Name: Black Key
Description: An old steel key. A green jewel is set in the center of the key's grip.
Evidence 6
Name: Newspaper Clipping 2
Description: Mimi Miney, nurse at Grey Surgical Clinic, died after falling asleep at the wheel. Articles about the car accident. [info] This is a newspaper clipping about the death of Mimi Miney, the nurse who worked at Turner Grey's clinic. It reads how Mimi died as a result of her car crashing when she fell asleep at the wheel and Director Hotti fills in some further parts of the article later on. The content is as follows-Highway of Nightmares-May 24 - Late last night, two women's car crashed into a highway center divide. One of the women was not able to escape the flaming wreckage and died at the site. Ongoing investigation has revealed that the driver had fallen asleep at the wheel. -Ms. Ini Miney Holds Interview About Crash- I was like, really tired and I dropped off to sleep. Then there was this crash, and like, I woke up in a huge sea of flames. I was like, still half-asleep, but I opened the right door and like, got out. I don't, like, remember anything else. -Doctor Lurking in the Shadows? If Ms. Ini Miney is to be believed, the one driving the car was her sister, Mimi Miney. Mimi Miney was the nurse at Grey Surgical Clinic where 14 patients were accidentally overdosed to their death. Is this then, just a mere coincidence...? 
Evidence 7
Name: Floor Plans (Crime Scene)
Description: A diagram of the Channeling Chamber. A four sectioned mat in front of a platform at the head.
Evidence 8
Name: Dr. Grey's Autopsy Report
Description: After being stabbed in the chest, he was shot in the forehead at point-blank. Stabbed in chest then shot at point-blank. Gunpowder residue around bullet hole.
Evidence 9
Name: Pistol
Description: Murder weapon. Was Grey's. Two shots fired. Bears Maya's and Grey's fingerprints.
Evidence 10
Name: Knife
Description: Murder weapon. A small fruit knife. Belongs to the Fey's. Bears Maya's fingerprints.
Evidence 11
Name: Maya's Costume
Description: Clothes Maya was wearing at the time of the murder. There are blood splatters on it. Clothes Maya was wearing at the time of the murder. This is Maya's robe that she wore on the day of Turner Grey's murder. It is stained with blood splatter and a bullet hole is present in the sleeve. The robe is otherwise clean. It is purple in color.
Evidence 12
Name: Lotta's Photo 1
Description: A picture taken at the murder scene. This is a photo taken by Lotta Hart of Maya Fey after they break into the Channeling Chamber when they hear a gunshot. Turner Grey is lying dead on the floor after being shot.
Evidence 13
Name: Lotta's Photo 2
Description: A picture taken at the murder scene. [caption] This is the second photo taken by Lotta Hart of Maya Fey after they break into the Channeling Chamber when they hear a gunshot. Turner Grey is lying dead on the floor after being shot behind her. Maya Fey is standing, pistol in hand, wearing a blood-splattered robe.
Evidence 14
Name: Sacred Urn
Description: Ami Fey's spirit is sealed within. It's chipped and cracked all over. Broken by Pearl right before the murder. Under repair in the hallway until police came.
Evidence 15
Name: Cloth Scrap
Description: Unburned remains found inside the garden incinerator. Small amount of blood is on it.
Evidence 16
Name: Pearl's Ball
Description: Pearl's favorite toy. She was playing with this at the time of the murder, it seems.
Evidence 17
Name: Clothing Box
Description: There is a hole that looks like a bullet hole about 8 inches off the ground.
Evidence 18
Name: License Photo
Description: Ini's photo for her driver's license. Director Hotti's treasured possession.

Testimonies:
Testimony 0
Testimony: Like, when the channeling started, I was, like, sleeping in the Side Room.
Person: Ini
Testimony 1
Testimony: Like, a little later, someone came into the room, like, really suddenly.
Person: Ini
Testimony 2
Testimony: It was, like, oh my gawd, totally my sister!
Person: Ini
Testimony 3
Testimony: I, like, hadn't seen her in, like, so long... I was so happy in, like, a sad way...
Person: Ini
Testimony 4
Testimony: I wasn't, like, scared at all. And, like, her costume looked totally, like, normal.
Person: Ini
Testimony 5
Testimony: My sister... She, like, told me something, like, totally terrible.
Person: Ini

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
cot:
Okay, let's tackle this problem step by step. The user is asking which evidence and testimony contradict each other. The key here is to find a pair where one evidence directly contradicts a testimony.

First, I'll go through each testimony and see what they say, then check the evidence to find any contradictions.

Looking at Testimony 0 from Ini Miney:
- Testimony 0: Ini says she was sleeping in the Side Room when the channeling started.
- Testimony 1: Someone came into the room suddenly, and it was her sister Mimi.
- Testimony 2: She recognizes her sister, who died a year ago.
- Testimony 4: She mentions her sister's costume looked normal.

Now, checking the evidence related to Mimi Miney and the Side Room:

Evidence 6 (Newspaper Clipping 2) states that Mimi Miney died in a car accident a year ago. So according to the evidence, Mimi is dead. However, Ini's testimony says she saw her sister Mimi in the Side Room, implying Mimi was present, which would be impossible if she's deceased. That's a contradiction between Testimony 2 (where Ini says she saw her sister) and Evidence 6 (which says Mimi is dead).

Another point: Evidence 11 (Maya's Costume) describes Maya's robe with blood splatters and a bullet hole. But Testimony 4 says Mimi's costume looked normal. Wait, but the testimony is about Mimi's costume, while the evidence refers to Maya's. So maybe not directly conflicting unless there's confusion between the two.

Also, the Side Room's location: Evidence 1 (Guidemap) mentions the Side Room is east of the Meditation Room, accessible via a winding path. If Ini was in the Side Room, but the testimony doesn't conflict with the map's description. 

The main contradiction is between Ini seeing her deceased sister (Testimony 2) and the evidence stating Mimi died a year ago (Evidence 6). Therefore, the pair should be Evidence 6 and Testimony 2.
</think>

cot:
Okay, let's tackle this problem step by step. I need to find a pair of evidence and testimony that contradict each other. The user provided a list of characters, evidences, and testimonies. My job is to go through them and find one pair where they don't align.

First, I'll start by reviewing the testimonies to see what each person is saying, then check the evidences to see if any of them conflict with those statements.

Looking at the testimonies from Ini Miney:

Testimony 0: "Like, the Side Room was, like, kinda dark, you know?"  
Testimony 1: "So like, the costume is, like, purple, right? The blood totally blended right in."  
Testimony 2: "And I, like, persuaded my sister it wasn't, like, right to do something like that."  
Testimony 3: "And then... like, I took my sister to the Channeling Chamber."  
Testimony 4: "I, like, didn't see anyone on the way to, like, the Channeling Chamber."

Now, let me look at the evidences. The key is to find an evidence that directly contradicts any of these statements.

Evidence 11: Maya's Costume. The description says it's purple with blood splatters and a bullet hole. Testimony 1 from Ini mentions the purple costume and the blood blending in. That seems consistent, so no contradiction there.

Evidence 12 and 13 are photos taken by Lotta. They show Maya in the Channeling Chamber with the body. Testimony 3 says Ini took her sister there, so maybe that's related, but not a contradiction.

Evidence 14 mentions the Sacred Urn being repaired in the hallway by Pearl. Pearl was in the hallway fixing it. Testimony 4 from Ini says she didn't see anyone on the way to the Channeling Chamber. If Pearl was in the hallway repairing the urn, then Ini should have seen Pearl there. That would be a contradiction because Ini claims she didn't see anyone on the way, but Pearl was present in the hallway.

Looking at Evidence 14's description: "Broken by Pearl right before the murder. Under repair in the hallway until police came." And Pearl's statement: "I found some glue and brought it to the hallway... and fixed the urn there."

So, if Pearl was in the hallway repairing the urn during the time Ini was going to the Channeling Chamber, Ini should have seen Pearl. But Ini's testimony 4 says she didn't see anyone. That's a contradiction between Evidence 14 and Testimony 4.

Wait, but the characters list says Pearl Fey is character 2, and her testimony isn't provided here. The testimonies provided are from Ini. The key point is that according to Evidence 14, Pearl was in the hallway repairing the urn. Therefore, if Ini was going through the hallway to the Channeling Chamber, she should have encountered Pearl there, but she testified she didn't see anyone. So the contradiction is between Evidence 14 and Testimony 4 (Ini's Testimony 4).

Alternatively, maybe another evidence? Let me check again.

Looking at Evidence 17: Clothing Box with a bullet hole. Not sure how that connects.

Evidence 15: Cloth scrap with blood in the incinerator. Maybe related to Mimi's death, but not directly Ini's testimony.

Evidence 6 is the newspaper clipping about Mimi's accident. Ini's earlier testimonies mention her sister Mimi, but that's not a direct contradiction.

The main point is the presence of Pearl in the hallway. Since Ini's testimony 4 states she didn't see anyone on the way, but Pearl was there repairing the urn (Evidence 14), that's a contradiction. So the pair would be Evidence 14 and Testimony 4.

Wait, but the user's instruction says to output the JSON with the numbers. Let me check the evidence numbers again.

Evidence 14 is the Sacred Urn, which mentions Pearl being in the hallway. Testimony 4 is Ini's fourth testimony. So the correct pair would be evidence 14 and testimony 4.

Yes, that's the contradiction. Pearl was present in the hallway, but Ini didn't see anyone.
</think>

cot:
Okay, let's tackle this problem step by step. I need to find a pair of evidence and testimony that contradict each other. Let me start by going through each evidence and testimony carefully.

First, let's look at the testimonies provided by Ini Miney. The key points from her testimonies are:

Testimony 0: The incident happened last year in May.
Testimony 1: Around that time, something bad happened at her sister's clinic.
Testimony 2: The night of the accident, her sister was tired while driving.
Testimony 3: Ini was also tired and fell asleep in the passenger seat.
Testimony 4: She woke up due to a jolt and saw flames.
Testimony 5: She opened the door and escaped.
Testimony 6: She didn't have her license, so she couldn't drive.

Now, looking at the evidences, especially Evidence 6 (Newspaper Clipping 2), which details the car accident involving Mimi and Ini. The article states that the crash happened on May 24, and that Ini was the driver. The article mentions that Mimi, the sister, was the nurse at Grey's clinic where the malpractice occurred on May 2nd. 

Wait a minute. Testimony 6 by Ini says she didn't have her license and couldn't drive, implying that she wasn't the driver. However, the newspaper clipping (Evidence 6) says that the driver was Mimi, Ini's sister. But in the article's interview part, Ini claims she was the one who was tired and fell asleep at the wheel, which would make her the driver. There's a contradiction here.

Hold on, let me check the details again. The newspaper clipping says: "If Ms. Ini Miney is to be believed, the one driving the car was her sister, Mimi Miney." Wait, that's conflicting. The article is quoting Ini as saying her sister was driving, but Ini's testimony (Testimony 6) says she couldn't drive because she didn't have a license. So according to Ini's testimony, she wasn't driving, but the newspaper clipping (Evidence 6) includes Ini's own statement where she says she was driving. That's a contradiction.

Wait, the article's section "-Ms. Ini Miney Holds Interview About Crash- I was like, really tired and I dropped off to sleep. Then there was this crash..." So Ini herself in the article admits she was driving and fell asleep. But in her current testimony (Testimony 6), she says she didn't have a license and couldn't take over driving, implying she wasn't driving. Therefore, Evidence 6 (the newspaper clipping) contradicts Testimony 6 because Ini's own statement in the article says she was driving, but her current testimony claims she couldn't drive due to no license.

Alternatively, maybe there's another point. Let me check other evidences. Evidence 18 is Ini's license photo, which is her driver's license. If she has a license, that would contradict Testimony 6 where she says she didn't have one. Wait, Evidence 18's description says it's her driver's license photo, so that would mean she did have a license, contradicting her testimony that she didn't. That's a solid contradiction.

Ah! That's the key. Evidence 18 is Ini's driver's license photo, meaning she had a license. But in Testimony 6, she states, "I, like, didn't have my license, so, like, I couldn't take over driving for her." This directly contradicts because if she had a license (as per Evidence 18), she could have driven. Therefore, the contradiction is between Evidence 18 and Testimony 6.
</think>

[info] This is a newspaper clipping about the death of Mimi Miney, the nurse who worked at Turner Grey's clinic. It reads how Mimi died as a result of her car crashing when she fell asleep at the wheel and Director Hotti fills in some further parts of the article later on. The content is as follows-Highway of Nightmares-May 24 - Late last night, two women's car crashed into a highway center divide. One of the women was not able to escape the flaming wreckage and died at the site. Ongoing investigation has revealed that the driver had fallen asleep at the wheel. -Ms. Ini Miney Holds Interview About Crash- I was like, really tired and I dropped off to sleep. Then there was this crash, and like, I woke up in a huge sea of flames. I was like, still half-asleep, but I opened the right door and like, got out. I don't, like, remember anything else. -Doctor Lurking in the Shadows? If Ms. Ini Miney is to be believed, the one driving the car was her sister, Mimi Miney. Mimi Miney was the nurse at Grey Surgical Clinic where 14 patients were accidentally overdosed to their death. Is this then, just a mere coincidence...?

Which evidence and testimony contradict each other? You must only answer one pair. You may output an explanation, but your answer must end with a JSON format like so: {"evidence": 2, "testimony": 3}. The answer JSON should strictly be the last line, followed by nothing else.
cot:
Okay, let's see. I need to find a pair of evidence and testimony that contradict each other. Let me start by going through each testimony and see what evidence might conflict with it.

First, looking at the testimonies from Ini Miney. Testimony 0 says she was close to getting her driver's license around the time of the accident. Testimony 4 mentions her sister wouldn't let a "newb" drive her car, implying Ini might not have had a license yet. 

Now, looking at the evidence. Evidence 18 is Ini's License Photo for her driver's license, which is described as Director Hotti's treasured possession. If Ini had a driver's license, that would mean she was licensed, but in Testimony 6 from a previous question, Ini said she didn't have her license and couldn't take over driving. Wait, but in the current testimonies here, Testimony 5 says she ended up in the passenger seat because her sister wouldn't let her drive. However, if Evidence 18 shows she had a license photo, that might mean she did have a license, contradicting her previous statement that she didn't. Wait, but in the current testimonies here, Testimony 0 says she was "really close to getting my license," which might mean she hadn't gotten it yet. However, the License Photo (Evidence 18) would imply she already had one. That's a contradiction. 

Alternatively, maybe the License Photo is from before the accident? The accident was a year ago, and the current case is about the murder. The timeline might matter. The newspaper clipping (Evidence 6) mentions the car accident was on May 24, which is after May 2 (the malpractice date). But the current testimonies are about the time around the accident. If the License Photo is her actual driver's license, then she would have been driving, conflicting with her testimony that her sister was driving. 

Wait, in the previous testimonies (from earlier user inputs), Ini said in Testimony 3 that she was in the passenger seat and her sister was driving. The newspaper clipping (Evidence 6) also states that the driver fell asleep, which was Ini according to her own testimony, but the article says Mimi was driving. Wait, no, the clipping says "If Ms. Ini Miney is to be believed, the one driving the car was her sister, Mimi Miney." But Ini's testimony here says her sister wouldn't let her drive, so Mimi was driving. But if Ini has a license (Evidence 18), that might mean she could have been driving, conflicting with her sister's refusal. Hmm, maybe the contradiction is that the License Photo (Evidence 18) shows she had a license, but her testimony says she was a newb and her sister wouldn't let her drive, implying she didn't have one yet. Therefore, the evidence (she has a license) contradicts her testimony (she didn't have it and couldn't drive). 

So the answer would be Evidence 18 and Testimony 4 or Testimony 0? Let me check the current testimonies again. Testimony 4 says her sister wouldn't let a newb (Ini) drive, implying Ini wasn't experienced. If she already had a license (Evidence 18), that contradicts being a newb. Therefore, the contradiction is between Evidence 18 and Testimony 4.
</think>
